byline.contributor: Laurie Goodstein contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Vatican reports defrocked archbishop Jozef Wesolowski, on trial for child sexual abuse and facing up to eight years in prison, was found dead in his Vatican City residence while under house arrest; former high-level cleric is accused of sexually abusing children while he was Vatican ambassador in Dominican Republic from 2008 to 2013.
lead_paragraph: He would have been the first high-level prelate to stand before a Vatican tribunal on such charges, but illness prevented the trial from proceeding.

headline.main: Jozef Wesolowski, Ex-Archbishop Accused of Sexual Abuse, Dies at 67
headline.print_headline: Former Envoy for Vatican, Facing Trial, Is Found Dead

snippet: He would have been the first high-level prelate to stand before a Vatican tribunal on such charges, but illness prevented the trial from proceeding.
